SELECT bm.bm_no,bm.bm_title,bm.bm_writer,bs.bs_file ,bm.bm_hit,bm.bm_group,bm.bm_pos,bm.bm_step,bm.bm_reg,bm.bm_pw FROM board_master_t bm, board_sub_t bs WHERE bm.bm_no=bs.bm_no(+)
AND bm.bm_no =#{bm_no}
AND bm_reg LIKE'%'||#{bm_reg}||'%'
AND bm_title LIKE'%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm_content LIKE'%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm_writer LIKE'%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
ORDER BY bm.bm_group desc,bm.bm_step asc
select NVL( (select /*+index_desc(board_master_t i_board_group) */ bm_group from board_master_t where rownum = 1 and bm_group >0) ,0)+1 bm_group from dual
